name: Jack Knight of the Yellow Bloom
desc: If 2 or more cards are in the same column, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to that column. You can only Special Summon "Jack Knight of the Yellow Bloom" once per turn this way. You can banish 1 "Jack Knight" monster from your GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field in this card's column; destroy it.
